name: Fitness Site Template
description: Complete fitness/gym website template with classes, trainers, memberships, and workout programs, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database for membership and class management

pages.Home.s: Homepage with hero section, featured classes, trainer highlights, and membership CTA
pages.Classes.s: Class schedule, descriptions, difficulty levels, and booking system
pages.Trainers.s: Trainer profiles, specializations, certifications, and booking
pages.Memberships.s: Membership tiers, pricing, benefits, and signup forms
pages.Programs.s: Workout programs, challenges, and personalized training plans
pages.About.s: Gym story, facilities, equipment, and community values
pages.Contact.s: Location, hours, contact info, and trial class booking

customization.tagline: Transform Your Body, Transform Your Life
customization.address: 456 Fitness Ave, Downtown District, Los Angeles, CA 90210

features: Responsive design optimized for mobile fitness tracking
Workout program library with progress tracking
SEO-friendly structure for local fitness searches

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and fitness_models.py, configure database and payment gateway
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler
installation.customization: Edit template.json values and gym-specific details
